The free radical scavenging capacity of the test sample was estimated as described by [ 21], with slight modifications. A solution of 0.135 mM DPPH in methanol was prepared in a dark bottle. The DPPH solution was reacted with graded concentrations (0.04, 0.02, 0.01, 0.005, 0.0025 mg/mL) of the aqueous extract and rutin in a ratio of 1:1. The resulting mixture was vortexed, incubated at room temperature for 30 min, and measured at an absorbance of 517 nm.
